answers.text:
Hi Catherine, 
Unfortunately I am unable to recommend a specific firm for you to use while evaluating the casino's finances. However, there are a few resources on the Knowledge Network related to casinos and local governments and I have included them below in case they might be of use to you and your team. 

Is Gambling a good economic bet?
http://bookstore.icma.org/freedocs/mlgs/Isgambling.pdf
-Downtown Casinos Partner for Whitewater Project Load
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/5132/Downtown_Casinos_Partner_for_Whitewater_Project_Loan
-Applied Lessons From Great by Choice actually includes a section on casino improvements and infrastructure changes which may be similar to the project in your local government. https://webapps.icma.org/conference_Handouts/handouts2013/Milton%20Dohoney-Applied%20Lessons.pdf

I hope these links are of use to you and that other local government officials chime in and share both the names of consultants and their experiences with you. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledhe Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Catherine Conlow
text: Can anyone recomend a consultanting firm that advises municipalities on gaming issues?  We are looking for a firm capable of providing independent analysis on casino finances as we look to update an existing agreement with a Casino that has expanded operations.
title: Gaming Consultants
